description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests for configuring wireless network settings on an xb6 platform, including WiFi radio and SSID settings, WPS, MAC filtering, band steering, and client pairing.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates WPS PIN checksum according to length and Luhn algorithm.

methods.name: validFilterParam
methods.description: Validates array of filter parameters ensuring printable characters and valid MAC addresses.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies settings to a specific SSID by triggering configuration update.
